description:
## What's the addon for?

It can replace the keycards with corpses holding the keys. (similar to what you see in Doom(2016) skull keys may spawn on top of stone pedestals. graphical HUD messages when picking up the keys.

## How to use it?

Just load it after D4T version 2.5 using your favorite mod launcher or drag-n-drop method.

Notes: Only works with the latest version of D4T.

Tested on PC using the latest GZDoom, Zandronum 3.0 and also tested on Delta Touch.

Credits:
D4D HF made by VICE - for the corpse sprite as base and the stone pedestal for skull keys.
Project Brutality devs - heads of the corpses.
JD-513 - PC testing and feedback.
Shockwave_S08 - Delta Touch testing and feedback.
Doom(2016) by ID Software, Bethesda - Graphics and sound assets.

Special Thanks to Michaelis for coding tips.
summary: An addon that can replace the keycards with corpses holding the keys. (similar to what you see in Doom(2016)
author: VICE,  Project Brutality devs,  JD-513,  Shockwave_S08,  Michaelis
